item.title: [FLINK-10998] flink-metrics-ganglia has LGPL dependency
item.description:
flink-metrics-ganglia depends on info.ganglia.gmetric4j:gmetric4j which depends on org.acplt:oncrpc.

org.acplt:oncrpc is licensed under the LGPL, which is a category-x license.

For the time being we should drop this module from all future releases.
